brief_title: Evaluation of the Bioavailability of Pramlintide
brief_summary: This is a randomized, open-label, crossover study to examine the bioavailability of pramlintide in normal weight and overweight subjects with type 1 and type 2 diabetes mellitus using insulin.
description: Pramlintide acetate (AC137) injection is a clear, colorless, sterile solution for injection. It consists of pramlintide in sodium acetate buffer, pH 4.0, containing 43mg/mL mannitol as an iso-osmolality modifier and 2.25 mg/mL metacresol as a preservative. The strength of pramlintide is 1.0 mg/mL for SC injection and 0.6 mg/mL for IV bolus injection.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - HbA1c value between 6-12% - BMI <= 27 kg/m2 or BMI >=30 to <= 45 kg/m2 - Consistent insulin regimen for 2 months prior to screening
